mapper.update: update d_drugoutstore_detail set keyid=keyid ,rowno=#{rowno} ,drugid=#{drugid} ,outqty=#{outqty} ,costprice=#{costprice} ,costamt=#{costamt} ,unitqty=#{unitqty} ,outmeasqty=#{outmeasqty} ,empbottleqty=#{empbottleqty} ,recycleqty=#{recycleqty} ,remark=#{remark} where keyid=#{keyid}

update d_drugoutstore_detail set keyid=keyid ,billid=#{billid} ,rowno=#{rowno} ,drugid=#{drugid} ,outqty=#{outqty} ,costprice=#{costprice} ,costamt=#{costamt} ,unitqty=#{unitqty} ,outmeasqty=#{outmeasqty} ,empbottleqty=#{empbottleqty} ,recycleqty=#{recycleqty} ,remark=#{remark} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and billid=#{Where_billid} and rowno=#{Where_rowno} and drugid=#{Where_drugid} and outqty=#{Where_outqty} and costprice=#{Where_costprice} and costamt=#{Where_costamt} and unitqty=#{Where_unitqty} and outmeasqty=#{Where_outmeasqty} and empbottleqty=#{Where_empbottleqty} and recycleqty=#{Where_recycleqty} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.billid "billid", t.rowno "rowno", t.drugid "drugid", t.outqty "outqty", t.costprice "costprice", t.costamt "costamt", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.outmeasqty "outmeasqty", t.empbottleqty "empbottleqty", t.recycleqty "recycleqty", t.remark "remark" from d_drugoutstore_detail t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.billid "billid", t.rowno "rowno", t.drugid "drugid", t.outqty "outqty", t.costprice "costprice", t.costamt "costamt", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.outmeasqty "outmeasqty", t.empbottleqty "empbottleqty", t.recycleqty "recycleqty", t.remark "remark" from d_drugoutstore_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.outqty=#{outqty} and t.costprice=#{costprice} and t.costamt=#{costamt} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.outmeasqty=#{outmeasqty} and t.empbottleqty=#{empbottleqty} and t.recycleqty=#{recycleqty} and t.remark=#{remark}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.billid "billid", t.rowno "rowno", t.drugid "drugid", t.outqty "outqty", t.costprice "costprice", t.costamt "costamt", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.outmeasqty "outmeasqty", t.empbottleqty "empbottleqty", t.recycleqty "recycleqty", t.remark "remark" from d_drugoutstore_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.outqty=#{outqty} and t.costprice=#{costprice} and t.costamt=#{costamt} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.outmeasqty=#{outmeasqty} and t.empbottleqty=#{empbottleqty} and t.recycleqty=#{recycleqty} and t.remark=#{remark}
mapper.delete: delete from d_drugoutstore_detail where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and billid=#{Where_billid} and rowno=#{Where_rowno} and drugid=#{Where_drugid} and outqty=#{Where_outqty} and costprice=#{Where_costprice} and costamt=#{Where_costamt} and unitqty=#{Where_unitqty} and outmeasqty=#{Where_outmeasqty} and empbottleqty=#{Where_empbottleqty} and recycleqty=#{Where_recycleqty} and remark=#{Where_remark}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.billid "billid", t.rowno "rowno", t.drugid "drugid", t.outqty "outqty", t.costprice "costprice", t.costamt "costamt", t.unitqty "unitqty", t.outmeasqty "outmeasqty", t.empbottleqty "empbottleqty", t.recycleqty "recycleqty", t.remark "remark", ddg.brand "brand" from d_drugoutstore_detail t left join d_drug ddg on ddg.drugid=t.drugid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.outqty=#{outqty} and t.costprice=#{costprice} and t.costamt=#{costamt} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.outmeasqty=#{outmeasqty} and t.empbottleqty=#{empbottleqty} and t.recycleqty=#{recycleqty} and t.remark=#{remark}

select count(*) from d_drugoutstore_detail t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.billid=#{billid} and t.rowno=#{rowno} and t.drugid=#{drugid} and t.outqty=#{outqty} and t.costprice=#{costprice} and t.costamt=#{costamt} and t.unitqty=#{unitqty} and t.outmeasqty=#{outmeasqty} and t.empbottleqty=#{empbottleqty} and t.recycleqty=#{recycleqty} and t.remark=#{remark}
